author: sproul
content: Heya <@!471975503859810316> , at SigP we've been wondering about how eth2.ethernodes.org works. The number of Lighthouse nodes seems to be dropping and dropping, with several nodes we know of not appearing at all. Could you give us a quick summary of how it works and whether it's up-to-date? We'd like to work out if there are any changes we've made recently that might have broken Lighthouse detection. Feel free to DM me and I'll make a group DM with <@!498009160982724610>

author: protolambda
content: What I experienced with rumor is that you need at least the right subset of protocols to be negotiated as part of libp2p identify, otherwise it may fail. Just a guess though, passive crawling is getting more difficult
